scripts.test-all: rm -rf output && yarn build-tests && yarn tests && yarn build-app-tests && yarn app-tests
scripts.clean-app: rm -rf dist/app && mkdir -p dist/app && cp -r fluid dist/app && cp web/index.html dist/app && cp -r web/css dist/app && cp -r web/pdf dist/app
scripts.build-app: yarn clean-app && spago build --purs-args '--strict --censor-codes=UserDefinedWarning' && purs-backend-es bundle-app --main App.Main --to dist/app/app.js
scripts.clean-pldi2024: rm -rf dist/pldi2024 && mkdir -p dist/pldi2024 && cp -r fluid dist/pldi2024 && cp web/pldi2024.html dist/pldi2024/index.html && cp -r web/css dist/pldi2024
scripts.build-pldi2024: yarn clean-pldi2024 && spago build --purs-args '--strict --censor-codes=UserDefinedWarning' && purs-backend-es bundle-app --main PLDI2024.Main --to dist/pldi2024/app.js
scripts.clean-tests: rm -rf dist/tests && mkdir -p dist/tests && cp web/tests.html dist/tests
scripts.clean-bench: rm -rf dist/benches && mkdir -p dist/benches && cp -r fluid dist/benches && cp web/index.html dist/benches && cp -r web/css dist/benches
scripts.clean-examples: rm -rf dist/examples && mkdir -p dist/examples && cp -r fluid dist/examples && cp web/index.html dist/examples && cp -r web/css dist/examples
scripts.build-examples: yarn clean-examples && spago build --purs-args '--strict --censor-codes=UserDefinedWarning' && purs-backend-es bundle-app --main Example.Example --to dist/examples/app.js
scripts.build-tests: yarn clean-tests && spago build --purs-args '--strict --censor-codes=UserDefinedWarning' && purs-backend-es bundle-app --main Test.Main --to dist/tests/app.js
scripts.build-bench: yarn clean-bench && spago build --purs-args '--strict --censor-codes=UserDefinedWarning' && purs-backend-es bundle-app --main Test.Benchmark.Main --to dist/benches/app.js
scripts.clean-app-tests: rm -rf dist/app-tests && mkdir -p dist/app-tests && cp web/tests.html dist/app-tests
scripts.build-app-tests: yarn clean-app-tests && spago build --purs-args '--strict --censor-codes=UserDefinedWarning' && purs-backend-es bundle-app --main Test.App.Main --to dist/app-tests/app.js
scripts.tidy: yarn purs-tidy format-in-place src/*.purs src/App/**/*.purs src/**/*.purs test/*.purs test/**/*.purs example/**/*.purs example/*.purs
